title: JS Workshop: Enter Ethereum with Pradhumna Pancholi
details:
Details
-------

Welcome to the JS Workshop! This is a place for intermediate and advanced JavaScript developers to learn new skills, experiment with interesting technologies and have tons of fun.

Pradhuma will be leading a workshop where we will fetching some data from blockchain using [ethers.js.](http://ethers.js.) It will be followed by a brief explanation of what are smart contracts, blockchain, providers, and ethereum mainnet (also use cases and what are people currently building in this realm). The app will be kept simpler for now ( fetching and displaying data). Lastly, deploying this with fleek ( so both web and ipfs).

Prerequisites:

*   A laptop with a web dev environment, including an editor and a local server
    
*   Some proficiency in JavaScript
    
*   A cheerful and inquisitive attitude
    

Timetable:

6:30 - Zoom Room opens

7:00 - workshop code-along

7:30 - everyone goes (stays) home
